Text.Page:
We're understrength and desperately afraid. People disappear overnight and no one sees them taken. Doesn't help that the woods aren't safe, either.

If you're looking to do some good, we'll take it.

Talk to Master Yedwin of the Explorer Guild.

The situation's grim. Between the disappearances and the unseelie, things are tough. We're isolated hereâ€”it's too dangerous to push through to Susurrus Woods or Amena Quatla.

We need basic supplies. Bring Thaqib some hyena hides and he can protect the troops better.

Can't miss the hyenas. They're lurking around the village.

Thanks. I can use these. I don't know what good it'll do, though. People disappear no matter how many soldiers we field.

Kaia grant me courage. I don't want to live in fear.
Those hyenas make it tough for supplies to get to us or to the other outposts. Getting rid of them serves two goals.
